summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Vaultz Locking Makeup Artist Case, Black White Stripe (VZ03755)
Review Date: 2017/10/21
Store: Vaultz
Product Description: ['At Vaultz, "If it\'s Important to You, Lock It Up." The Vaultz Makeup Artist Case allows you to lock your personal and private items up in style. This durable and chic box is ideal for carrying makeup and other cosmetics on the go. The reliable key lock provides security, and the sturdy construction features steel corners, aluminum reinforcement, and a convenient handle for easy carrying. This makeup case features a built-in 14 brush holder in lid, a removable, divided, upper tray for simple access to lower compartment and 5 adjustable dividers to customize the space. This is a makeup case that you are sure to love. Black White Stripe.']
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '9.75 x 9.13 x 15.38 inches; 2.8 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'VZ03755', 'UPC': '826030037553', 'Manufacturer': 'Ideastream Consumer Products, LLC'}
Review Text: Plenty of room and does not weigh alot empty.
Review Title: plenty of room
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Lashtoniic Eyelash & Eyebrow Growth Serum - Grows Longer, Fuller, Thicker Lashes & Brows in 30 Days - 100% Natural Lash Enhancer Conditioner Treatment, No Irritation
Review Date: 2017/10/21
Store: QBEXJ
Average Rating: 3.3
Product Details: {'Brand': 'QBEXJ', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Type': 'Box', 'Specialty': 'Natural', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.41 x 0.59 x 0.59 inches; 0.63 Ounces', 'UPC': '734010214415'}
Review Text: It seems to work.  I have been using this for about 3 weeks and notice longer lashes and thicker eyebrows.  I use it twice a day.  UPDATE:  I am on my second tube and I hope they do not stop making this stuff.  I have tried other serums but they burned my eyes.  This ones does not burn unless I actually drop it into my eye.  It has improved the length and health of my lashes and I seem to have more lashes when I curl them.  I am happy with this product and do not feel the need to purchase anything more expensive or that might work faster.
Review Title: Notice a difference after about 3 weeks.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Eyebrow Makeup Gel, Eyebrow Tint Gel, Eyebrow Dye Cream, 2Pcs Natural Color Eyebrow Gel, Waterproof Long Lasting Eyebrow Dye Gel for Eyebrow Makeup
Review Date: 2017/10/23
Store: CidBestOfficial
Average Rating: 3.0
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.84 x 2.32 x 0.75 inches; 1.62 Ounces'}
Review Text: Works really well on my greying brows.  Would rather purchase in singles, but this is not bad.  The dark is really dark.  Lots of pigment.  I would repurchase
Review Title: Covers grey brow hairs
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Frcolor Wig Grip Wig Comfort Scarf Head Hair Band Adjustable Fastern (Beige)
Review Date: 2017/12/28
Store: FRCOLOR
Average Rating: 3.3
Product Details: {'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Occasion': 'Wedding, Birthday', 'Material': 'Velvet', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Item Weight': '0.04 Pounds', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '21.3 x 2.01 x 0.08 inches; 0.64 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SG_B071YW1P7X_US', 'UPC': '191579152105'}
Review Text: I wear a wig every day and do not want to be without this
Review Title: Works really well
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Diane Bobby Pins, Black, 2", 300 Count
Review Date: 2017/12/29
Store: Diane
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Diane', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Color': 'Black', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Rubber', 'Package Dimensions': '4.45 x 4.41 x 1.65 inches; 7.05 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'D452', 'UPC': '824703004529'}
Review Text: They are bobby pins....what can I say.  I use the. Every day to pin my hair up under a wig.
Review Title: They are bobby pins
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Short Straight Silvery Grey Wigs Heat Resistant Synthetic Natural Ombre Bob Cosplay Hair Wig for Women Shoulder Length
Review Date: 2018/01/02
Average Rating: 3.5
Product Details: {'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Special Feature': 'Heat Resistant', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '10.2 x 6.69 x 2.01 inches; 9.59 Ounces'}
Review Text: Nice wig or the price, better after I added some rooting in a darker color.
Review Title: Nice for the price
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
**Genuine Preferences and Patterns:**

1. **Beauty and Cosmetics**: Strong focus on makeup organization, eyelash and eyebrow enhancement, and eyebrow makeup products. Regularly seeks functional and stylish solutions for cosmetic storage and makeup application.

2. **Wig Usage**: Frequent purchases related to wigs, including comfort accessories and styling products, indicating regular wig wear and a desire for comfort and versatility in style. 

3. **Natural and Effective Products**: Preference for natural ingredients, as seen in the choice of eyelash and eyebrow serums. Values products that provide noticeable results without irritation.

4. **Practicality and Functionality**: Prioritizes durable and practical items, such as storage solutions and everyday hair accessories (like bobby pins), reflecting a need for efficiency in personal grooming routines.

5. **Consumer Confidence**: Positive reviews suggest satisfaction with past purchases and a likelihood of repeat purchases, highlighting a trend toward loyalty to products that prove effective and convenient.

6. **Price Sensitivity**: Awareness of value for money, indicated by a willingness to use less expensive options that still deliver results, demonstrating a pragmatic approach to beauty and grooming expenses.

Overall, this individual demonstrates a clear pattern of valuing functionality, effectiveness, and style in beauty-related purchases, with a consistent emphasis on personal grooming and enhancement products.
